summary: A group of small but vicious alien creatures called Crites escape from an alien prison transport vessel and land near a small farm town on earth, pursued by two shape-shifting bounty hunters.
cast: Dee Wallace|M. Emmet Walsh|Billy Green Bush|Scott Grimes|Nadine Van der Velde|Don Keith Opper|Billy Zane|Ethan Phillips|Terrence Mann|Jeremy Lawrence|Lin Shaye|Michael Lee Gogin|Art Frankel|Douglas Koth|Montrose Hagins|Roger Hampton|Chuck Lindsly|David Stenstrom|Adele Malis-Morey|Corey Burton|Edward Chiodo|Adolf Hitler
keywords: eaten alive|male humanoid alien|extraterrestrial creature|extraterrestrial bounty hunter|farm
title: Critters
